headline: ONEOK (NYSE:OKE) Faces 12% Share Price Drop In April As Tariffs Add To Market Volatility
summary: In April, ONEOK (NYSE:OKE) experienced an 12% decline in its share price. This drop coincided with significant market volatility sparked by President Trump's announcement of sweeping tariffs, leading to a broad market sell-off. The Dow fell 5.5%, S&P 500 dropped 6%, and the Nasdaq entered bear market territory, which exerted pressure on various sectors, including energy. ONEOK, an energy infrastructure company, was not immune to these broader economic uncertainties, as worries over global...
